articles.title: Russia assembles 'shadow fleet' of more than 100 oil tankers as Putin tries to bust western sanctions - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Shipping brokers and analysts told the Financial Times Moscow has quietly added tankers this year and comes as Europe imposes a price cap on Russian oil.
articles.content:
Russia has assembled a "shadow fleet" of more than 100 oil tankers in a bid to bust western sanctions imposed following Vladimir Putin's invasion of Ukraine, the Financial Times reported.

articles.content:

articles.title: BBVA, Best Global Bank of the Year, according to The Banker - Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria
articles.description: The British publication, which is part of the Financial Times group, selected the BBVA Group as the Global Bank of the Year. The Banker also recognized BBVA as the Best Bank in Western Europe, Spain, Peru and Colombia.
